desc: Kobindi 4 Ever sales t-shirts and other products that helps to instill positive affirmations, motivation, and self-worth in mankind. The purpose of this store is to generate legacies not only for the founder's heirs, but also give hope and drive to others who desire to build upon their quality of life.

layout.text: Kobindi 4Ever items are personally customized by it's founder, Lillie Lyons, who believes that everyone has the capability of being successful. Success is in the "Eye of the Beholder." Some may need a little help, while others may need a little more motivation. Each item in the Kobindi 4 Ever brand is geared towards encouraging someone to improve their quality of life, be it physically, emotionally or spiritually. We are all winners in the end!
